student1.name: James W.
student1.content: Liam's Cambridge interview prep was invaluable. His deep understanding of economics and ability to explain complex concepts made all the difference. I got my offer!

student2.name: Sarah L.
student2.content: Finally found someone who could explain Laurent Series in a way that makes sense! Liam's patient approach and real-world examples transformed my understanding.

student3.name: Chen M.
student3.content: Preparing for my CFA with Liam's guidance was excellent. His Barclays and Deloitte experience brings practical insights you won't find in textbooks.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, flexible, and tailored to your needs
howItWorks.step1Desc: Contact me with your subject area, current level, and learning goals. We'll discuss your specific needs.
howItWorks.step2Desc: I'll create a personalized learning plan with materials tailored to your curriculum and examination requirements.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Flexible online sessions at times that suit you, with ongoing support and progress tracking.

hero.title: Cambridge Education. Finance Experience. Global Perspective.
hero.subtitle: Elite academic credentials combined with professional finance expertise and a genuine passion for helping students excel.

background.title: Professional Background
background.para1: I'm a Cambridge University graduate with distinguished qualifications including both ACA (Associate Chartered Accountant) and CFA (Chartered Financial Analyst) designations, as well as National Mandarin Test Level 2 Grade A certification.
background.para2: My professional experience spans top-tier finance institutions including Barclays Capital and Deloitte, where I developed deep expertise in quantitative analysis, financial modeling, and complex problem-solving methodologies.
background.para3: Today, I operate a specialized overseas academic support service, providing comprehensive tutoring across mathematics, economics, finance, statistics, and law. My unique combination of elite academic training, professional finance credentials, and cross-cultural teaching expertise sets me apart in the competitive educational support market.

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1: Include all relevant information and context in your question.
tips.tip2: Quick homework help, image-based problems, and general math questions.
tips.tip3: Complex problems requiring highest accuracy, competition math, and proof verification.
